name: SEG-Y Zip

screenshots.caption: A simple example in a Linux xterm (well, kterm actually).

short_description: SEG-Y files need special compression because they don't compress well using gzip and the like. The code is cross-platform C++ using nothing else than standard system libraries. This is a spin-off from the OpendTect project (http://opendtect.org).
